TopicTitle: scatterer sunflare not appearing in screenshots

Articles.Content: A big part about playing this game is taking screenshots and images of the breathtaking sights in this game, but whenever i take screenshots, the sunflare doesn't go through! is there anyway to make it so that the screenshot option in this game captures the sunflare as well? or will i have to use an external option? it's not urgent, but it would be nice to have them go through!
